properties.address: The Hungate Centre, North Yorkshire YO18 7DG
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits at the new Musical Memories Lunch Club for older people — Winter Warmers. There’ll be good company, tea & coffee, crafts & activities, speakers, newspapers, jigsaws, board games, singing and music every Wednesday throughout the winter — in fact a youthful club for the over 60’s! You can pop in just for a warm and a coffee, or you can stay for the whole day... whatever suits you. A hearty soup & roll and a homemade hot pud will be served between 12.00 and 1.00 All for £5 If you would like to join us or want to know more about Winter Warmers the Musical Memories Lunch Club Contact: Ruth on 07527 006402
properties.title: Hungate Centre

properties.address: Pickering library, The Ropery, Pickering, North Yorkshire YO18 8DY
properties.description: Pickering's Library loaning books, audiobooks and DVDs. A selection of daily papers is available and computers are available for public use. We have a coffee area with a hot drinks machine.
properties.title: Pickering Library
